name: ADPHORUS TEKNOLOJİ ANONİM ŞİRKETİ
description: Developer of a travel marketing platform designed to provide automated, scalable and easy to execute a marketing science strategy. The company's travel marketing platform offers smart automation, algorithmic optimization, structured testing and customized reporting, enabling travel brands to scale their revenues through a scientific approach to travel advertising on Facebook and Instagram.
one_liner: Developer of a travel marketing platform designed to provide automated, scalable and easy to execute a marketing science strategy. The company's travel marketing platform offers smart automation, algorithmic optimization, structured testing and customized reporting, enabling travel brands to scale their revenues through a scientific approach to travel advertising on Facebook and Instagram.
